infoText: Multiple updates, too many to list but suffice this is a biggun!  We are very nearly ready to release the map for all of you to enjoy this wonderful pack we have been working so hard on!
A new beta of the map has been released!  Get it while it's hot!

Please remember, the map is currently in beta status and WILL be updated.  We welcome all feedback for bugs, ideas, etc.  Just submit any reports to the FallCraft github repository https://github.com/GreatOrator/FallCraft-Map/issues
